title: Green Goddess Smoothie
directions: Combine all ingredients together in blender container and blend until smooth.
ingredients: 1 cup frozen peaches, pineapple, or mango (you can choose which type of fruit you want, or create a custom mix)
1 cup coconut milk (water, milk, almond milk, and coconut water also works)
sweetener of choice (stevia, agave nectar, or honey)
